title: Bleomycin
summary: Bleomycin is a medication used to treat cancer.[4] This includes Hodgkin's lymphoma, non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, testicular cancer, ovarian cancer, and cervical cancer among others.[4] Typically used with other cancer medications,[4] it can be given intravenously, by injection into a muscle or under the skin.[4] It may also be administered inside the chest to help prevent the recurrence of a fluid around the lung due to cancer; however talc is better for this.[4][5]
